**sigh**... I would have more sex if I could... But there are many reasons 
why I can't:
1. I'm WAY underage.
2. I live with 3 people, a dog and a cat. Talk about CONSTANT INTERRUPTION? 
AND, my brother is always upstairs! In his room! 3 rooms from my room! 
WHICH IS ALSO UPSTAIRS! My parents would be super suspicious.
3. I would never have permission to bring a boy into the house. Ever. 
Unless it was my 6-year-old cousin to play Minecraft. Downstairs.
4. I can barely MASTURBATE in peace! I try to masturbate every once in a 
while (once or twice a month, maybe every 2 months) and my bro always 
interrupts like twice.

But yeah, I can't stand it. I'm always so horny and as a virgin I have no 
clue what it's like to have a dick sliding in and out of you. I probably 
won't have sex for years to come (see what I did there? LOL! CUM! xD!).

know if you could call it sex. Yeah, we made out a bunch and we tried some

arrived (I didn't want to write "came" there... because LOOOOOL) and then
